name: Dinner Tonight: Puglian Chickpea Soup
description: I've gotten into a habit of cooking a pot of dried beans every Sunday, then finding ways to use them throughout the week (soupy beans make a wonderful breakfast with a fried egg on top). Recently I cooked chickpeas instead...
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces dried pasta with a broad surface for drying, such as pappardelle

recipeInstructions.text: If starting from dried, bring the chickpeas and stock to boil and simmer until the beans are cooked through. If using canned, drain and rinse the chickpeas and add to simmering stock and cook until tender.
